SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BSNS_MNG_BOARD BMB LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_MNG_BOARD_FL BMBF ON BMB.BSNS_CODE = BMBF.BSNS_CODE AND BMB.BOARD_SN = BMBF.BOARD_SN AND BMBF.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND BMB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BMB.BSNS_CODE = #{BSNS_CODE} AND BMB.BOARD_GBN_CD = #{BOARD_GBN_CD}
AND BMB.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND BMB.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT(BMB.SUBJECT,BMB.CONTENTS) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT BMB.BSNS_CODE ,BMB.BOARD_SN ,BMB.BOARD_GBN_CD ,BMB.SUBJECT ,BMB.CONTENTS ,BMB.HIT_COUNT ,BMB.LIKE_COUNT ,BMBF.BOARD_FL_SN ,BMBF.ORIGIN_FL_NM ,BMBF.FL_NM ,BMBF.FL_PATH FROM BSNS_MNG_BOARD BMB LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_MNG_BOARD_FL BMBF ON BMB.BSNS_CODE = BMBF.BSNS_CODE AND BMB.BOARD_SN = BMBF.BOARD_SN AND BMBF.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND BMB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BMB.BSNS_CODE = #{BSNS_CODE} AND BMB.BOARD_GBN_CD = #{BOARD_GBN_CD} AND BMB.BOARD_SN = #{BOARD_SN}
